attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I encourage the Prime Minister, on his next photo op in Helmand, to use one of the snatch landrovers that he provides for the troops as his personal transport as a show of his confidence in the vehicles capabilities.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
